name: Multi Wait
description: Use this function to make one or more NPCs wait or stop moving by returning true for is_waiting.

is_waiting.description: Set to true to make the NPC wait at their current position.

source_npc_ids.description: An array containing the IDs of one or more NPCs that will be waiting.

prompt: `{key}` if requested to wait or stop
llm_feedback: {llm_output_source_names} are about to wait at their position at {playerName}'s request. {llm_output_source_names} will complete this action to the best of their ability and find a rationalization for the action if needed.
veto_warning: {llm_output_source_names} are about to wait at their position at {playerName}'s request. Begin your response with <veto> if any NPC would refuse to do so then explain in first person in character why.
